# t-modal

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description              | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `close`   | `close`   |                          | `string`  | `"x"`   |
| `opened`  | `opened`  |                          | `boolean` | `false` |
| `size`    | `size`    | (optional) Modal size    | `string`  | `""`    |
| `theme`   | `theme`   | (optional) Modal theme   | `string`  | `""`    |
| `variant` | `variant` | (optional) Modal variant | `string`  | `""`    |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                              | Description                                 |
| --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| `--modal-actions-padding`         | Padding of the modal actions                |
| `--modal-backdrop-background`     | Color of the backdrop of the modal          |
| `--modal-background-color`        | Background color of the modal               |
| `--modal-body-border-bottom`      | Border bottom of the modal body             |
| `--modal-body-padding`            | Padding of the modal body                   |
| `--modal-border-radius`           | Border radius of the modal                  |
| `--modal-box-shadow`              | Box shadow of the modal                     |
| `--modal-close-font-size`         | Font size of the modal close button         |
| `--modal-close-height`            | Height of the modal close button            |
| `--modal-close-hover-opacity`     | Hover opacity of the modal close button     |
| `--modal-close-opacity`           | Opacity of the modal close button           |
| `--modal-color`                   | Color of the text in the modal              |
| `--modal-header-border-bottom`    | Border bottom of the modal header           |
| `--modal-header-color`            | Color of the text of the modal header       |
| `--modal-header-font-size`        | Font size of the modal header               |
| `--modal-header-margin`           | Margin of the modal header                  |
| `--modal-header-padding`          | Padding of the modal header                 |
| `--modal-header-slot-color`       | Color of the text of the modal header slot  |
| `--modal-header-slot-font-size`   | Font size of the modal header slot          |
| `--modal-header-slot-font-weight` | Font weight of the modal header slot        |
| `--modal-header-slot-margin`      | Margin of the modal header slot             |
| `--modal-max-width`               | Max width of the modal                      |
| `--modal-opened-top`              | Top position of the modal when it is opened |
| `--modal-padding`                 | Padding of the modal                        |
